Detailed Description

Runtime error handler function declaration, must be implemented independently by each platform.

Function Documentation

void CriticalErrorHandler ( Hsp_Status_t  status,
uint32_t  context1,
uint32_t context2  __DECL_DEBUG_PARAMETERS 
)

Critical error handler.

Description: Critical error handler

  • Called by main code when a non-recoverable error occurs.
  • Must be implemented indepdently for each supported platform.
  • Function must NOT return.
Parameters
statusHSP status code representing the error that has occurred.
context1First context value. This can be any user-supplied value relating to the error.
context2Second context value. This can be any user-supplied value relating to the error.
functionDEBUG ONLY - Pointer to name of function that caused the error.
fileDEBUG ONLY - Pointer to source filename where error occurred.
lineDEBUG ONLY - Source line number where error occurred.
Returns
void
